channel.title: Timely Transports on Pandaqi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Timely Transports on Pandaqi Blog

item.title: Timely Transports (Part 3)
item.description: In part 2 I explained 50% of the algorithms/ideas needed to generate a random board. In this part I explain the other half!

item.title: Timely Transports (Part 2)
item.description: In part 1 I outlined the difficulties with what I was trying to do (combine a boardgame and smartphone, and generate random boards), but also why I want to do it.

item.title: Timely Transports (Part 1)
item.description: Welcome to the technical devlog for Timely Transports Timely Transports is the first ever hybrid board + smartphone game.
